channel.title: How do u make someone mod on your server?

item.title: How do u make someone mod on your server?
item.dc:creator: @hypnoticpimp hypnoticpimp
item.description:
@hypnoticpimp wrote:

lol firstoff goto client.java and find this

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hypnoticpimp”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“snowfox144”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cannabis”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Sepranem”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pimp”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“vanilla coke”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))[/code]

wher is says else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“snowfox144”))

change [glow=red,2,300]snowfox144[/glow] to wut ur mods name is and this

[glow=red,2,300]playerRights = 1;[/glow]

is the level he will be

1 = mod
2 = G-mod
3 = Admin

wen ur done save and compile

Read full topic
